00041 /* We now scale W_ideal such that det(W_ideal) == 1, so don't scale here 
00042 static void init_scale_factors( double factors[MIXED] )
00043 {
00044   for (int i = 0; i < MIXED; ++i)
00045     factors[i] = 0.0;
00046   
00047   factors[     TRIANGLE] = 0.21934566882541542;
00048   factors[QUADRILATERAL] = 0.25;
00049   factors[  TETRAHEDRON] = 0.08171340981758000;
00050   factors[      PYRAMID] = 0.06068647146341543;
00051   factors[        PRISM] = 0.07311522294180514;
00052   factors[   HEXAHEDRON] = 0.08333333333333333;
00053 }
00054 */

00056 RefSizeTargetCalculator::RefSizeTargetCalculator( 
00057                            ReferenceMesh* reference_mesh,
00058                            TargetCalculator* tc )
00059    : refMesh( reference_mesh ),
00060      scaledTargets( tc )
00061  {} //   { init_scale_factors( scaleFactor ); }
00062    
00063 RefSizeTargetCalculator::RefSizeTargetCalculator( 
00064                            ReferenceMesh* reference_mesh  )
00065    : refMesh( reference_mesh ),
00066      scaledTargets( &defaultTargets )
00067  {} //   { init_scale_factors( scaleFactor );  }
00068 
00069 double RefSizeTargetCalculator::average_edge_length( PatchData& pd, 
00070                                                      size_t element,
00071                                                      MsqError& err )
00072 {  
00073   Vector3D coords[8];
00074   MsqMeshEntity& elem = pd.element_by_index( element );
00075   const size_t* conn = elem.get_vertex_index_array();
00076   size_t nvtx = elem.vertex_count();
00077   if (nvtx > (sizeof(coords)/sizeof(coords[0]))) {
00078     MSQ_SETERR(err)("Invalid element type", MsqError::UNSUPPORTED_ELEMENT );
00079     return false;
00080   }
00081   
00082   Mesh::VertexHandle handles[8];
00083   for (unsigned i = 0; i < nvtx; ++i)
00084     handles[i] = pd.get_vertex_handles_array()[conn[i]];
00085   
00086   refMesh->get_reference_vertex_coordinates( handles, nvtx, coords, err );
00087   MSQ_ERRZERO(err);
00088 
00089   EntityTopology type = elem.get_element_type();
00090   unsigned num_edges = TopologyInfo::edges( type );
00091   double len_sum = 0.0;
00092   for (unsigned i = 0; i < num_edges; ++i) {
00093     const unsigned* edge = TopologyInfo::edge_vertices( type, i );
00094     len_sum += (coords[edge[0]] - coords[edge[1]]).length();
00095   }
00096   return len_sum * (1.0/num_edges); // scaleFactor[type];
00097 }
00098                                              
00099  
00100 bool RefSizeTargetCalculator::get_3D_target( PatchData& pd, 
00101                                              size_t element,
00102                                              Sample sample,
00103                                              MsqMatrix<3,3>& W,
00104                                              MsqError& err )
00105 {
00106   scaledTargets->get_3D_target( pd, element, sample, W, err );
00107   MSQ_ERRZERO(err);
00108  
00109   double f = average_edge_length( pd, element, err );
00110   MSQ_ERRZERO(err);
00111   W *= f;
00112   
00113   return true;
00114 }
00115 
00116 bool RefSizeTargetCalculator::get_surface_target( PatchData& pd, 
00117                                             size_t element,
00118                                             Sample sample,

00120                                             MsqError& err )

00123   MSQ_ERRZERO(err);
00124  
00125   double f = average_edge_length( pd, element, err );
00126   MSQ_ERRZERO(err);
00127   W *= f;
00128   
00129   return true;
00130 }
00131 
00132 bool RefSizeTargetCalculator::get_2D_target( PatchData& pd, 
00133                                             size_t element,
00134                                             Sample sample,
00135                                             MsqMatrix<2,2>& W,
00136                                             MsqError& err )
00137 {
00138   scaledTargets->get_2D_target( pd, element, sample, W, err );
00139   MSQ_ERRZERO(err);
00140  
00141   double f = average_edge_length( pd, element, err );
00142   MSQ_ERRZERO(err);
00143   W *= f;
00144   
00145   return true;
00146 }
